events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle in a minor collision with another car at an intersection.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to mention of the vehicle collision and related damages.
An experienced claims agent has been assigned to handle the customer's auto accident case to ensure smooth processing.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the accident claim and informed the customer that the investigation will start shortly.
The customer was requested to submit photographs of the damaged vehicle and the police accident report as supporting documents.
The customer uploaded all requested documents including police reports and images of the car's collision damage within the deadline.
The claims investigation team began assessing the submitted evidence relating to the vehicle collision and liability.
The investigation concluded that the customer was not at fault in the auto accident and damage assessments were verified.
A settlement offer covering repair costs and rental car reimbursement was proposed to the customer for approval.
The customer responded positively, thanking for the prompt and fair settlement offer on their auto accident claim.
The claim was officially approved following acceptance of the settlement terms by the customer.
Payment for vehicle repairs and associated costs was issued promptly to the customerâ€™s account.
The auto accident claim case was closed after full settlement and confirmation of customer satisfaction.
